name: Bumfuzzle-prototype
description:
This is a demo ,Bumfuzzle Is in underdevelopment , an intense 2d platformer which will challenge you at each point. A beautiful vibrant minimilist environment with a charming little character . It would be an incredible assistance if u test it and audit it , I will consider every single thought which will push me to develope an extraordinary game.

Note

- "Sound" , "transition effects" and "option button" is not available yet.
